Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.recovery.journal

This package contains classes for representing journal entries for alarms, messages, or faults for possible recovery in the event of engine failure.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IAeJournalEntry Defines interface for process journal entries.
IAeJournalEntryFactory Defines factory interface for creating journal entries from storage.
 

Class Summary
AeAbstractJournalEntry Implements abstract base class for journal entries.
AeAlarmJournalEntry Implements journal entry for alarm.
AeCompensateSubprocessJournalEntry Journal entry for subprocess compensation.
AeEngineFailureJournalEntry Implements journal entry for engine failure.
AeInboundReceiveJournalEntry Implements journal entry for inbound receive.
AeInvokeDataJournalEntry Implements journal entry for invoke data.
AeInvokeFaultJournalEntry Implements journal entry for invoke fault.
AeInvokePendingJournalEntry Implements journal entry for pending invokes.
AeInvokeTransmittedJournalEntry Journal entry for durable invokes.
AeJournalEntryFactory Implements factory to construct instances of IAeJournalEntry from the entry's persisted data: entry type, location id, journal entry id, and storage document.
AeSentReplyJournalEntry Implements journal entry for a sent reply.
 

Exception Summary
AeJournalEntryFactory.AeUnknownEntryTypeException Implements an exception that reports an unknown entry type.
AeMissingStorageDocumentException Implements an exception that reports a missing storage document for a journal entry.
 

Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.recovery.journal Description

This package contains classes for representing journal entries for alarms, messages, or faults for possible recovery in the event of engine failure.
